hero.title: Focus on your business. Konty takes care of the rest.
hero.subtitle: A stable, reliable Point of Sale system you can count on — day after day.

testimonials.title: What Our Customers Say
testimonials.description: Stability, simplicity, and support that help them run their business with peace of mind

t1.name: Marko Petrović
t1.quote: We switched to Konty six months ago and it's made a real difference. Orders flow smoothly from front to kitchen, and my staff picked it up quickly. Much less stressful during busy periods.

t2.name: Ana Nikolić
t2.quote: Inventory management used to take me hours each week. Now I can see stock levels instantly and get alerts when items are running low. Saves me a lot of time.

t3.name: Stefan Jovanović
t3.quote: The interface is intuitive - new employees learn it quickly. Customer checkout is faster and we can track our daily sales easily. Good investment for our coffee shop.

t4.name: Milica Stojanović
t4.quote: Clean, simple system that does what we need. Processing payments is straightforward and the daily reports help me understand our sales patterns better.

clients.title: Partners Who Chose Konty
clients.description: More than 9,000 businesses count on Konty every day

getStarted.title: Get started in 48 hours
getStarted.description: Switching to Konty is quick and easy

step1.title: 15-minute call
step1.description: Tell us about your restaurant. We build your custom setup. That's literally all you do today.

step2.title: Everything transfers
step2.description: Menu, staff, tables, history - all moved perfectly. Integrations connected. You do nothing.

step3.title: Staff training
step3.description: We come to you during slow hours. 30-minute sessions. Even tech-haters learn it instantly.

step4.title: You're live
step4.description: Take your first order. We stay all day. Run old system parallel if you want. Zero pressure.

pricing.title: Simple, Fair Pricing. No hidden costs.
pricing.description: Choose the plan that fits your needs. Cancel whenever you want.

start.title: Starter
start.description: For small venues needing simple checkout.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: For restaurants needing more control and tracking.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For larger operations needing advanced features.

start.title: Starter
start.description: For small shops needing simple checkout.

standard.title: Standard
standard.description: For stores needing more control and tracking.

premium.title: Premium
premium.description: For larger operations needing advanced features.

pricing.a1: We offer three tiers: Starter, Standard, and Premium with monthly billing. Each plan includes core POS features with additional capabilities at higher tiers.
pricing.a2: All plan prices include software updates, customer support, and cloud hosting. No setup fees or long-term contracts required.

features.title: Simple. Reliable. Ready to work.
features.description: Everything you need for stable sales and secure checkout, with an intuitive system anyone can start using quickly.

kitchenDisplay.description: Orders display clearly in the kitchen with timing and preparation notes. Helps coordinate service and reduce wait times for customers.
kitchenDisplay.title: Kitchen Display System

staffManagement.description: Intuitive interface that's easy to learn. Role-based access and simple workflows help new team members get up to speed quickly.
staffManagement.title: Easy Staff Training

tableManagement.description: Visual table layout shows current status, order progress, and payment details. Helps servers coordinate service efficiently.
tableManagement.title: Table Management

customerInsights.description: Track customer preferences and purchase history. Generate reports to understand buying patterns and optimize inventory.
customerInsights.title: Customer Analytics

inventory.description: Real-time stock tracking with low inventory alerts. Barcode scanning for quick updates and accurate counts.
inventory.title: Inventory Management

quickCheckout.description: Fast payment processing with support for cards, cash, and mobile payments. Simple interface speeds up transactions.
quickCheckout.title: Quick Checkout Process

faq.a1: Konty is a modern point-of-sale system that helps businesses digitize their operations. It enables sales tracking, inventory management, reporting, and compliance.
faq.a2: Yes, Konty works offline too. All data is stored locally and syncs automatically when you reconnect to the internet.
faq.a3: You can start in just 5 minutes! Sign up, add products, and start selling. No installation or special hardware required.
faq.a4: Yes, Konty is fully compliant with US tax regulations. Automatically generates compliant receipts and reports.
faq.a5: You get 30 days of free access to all features. No credit card required. After expiry, choose the plan that suits you.
faq.q2: Can I use Konty without internet?
faq.q3: How quickly can I start using it?
faq.q5: How does the free trial work?

hero.title: Everywhere you need it!
hero.subtitle: Get Konty for any device or platform.
hero.description: Whether you prefer the convenience of web-based access, the familiarity of Windows applications, the mobility of Android devices, or the reliability of MacOS, our software is adaptable to your preferred operating system.

hero.features: Easy setup • Local support • Flexible plans
hero.subtitle: Complete restaurant management system with table service, order processing, and kitchen coordination. Designed for food service businesses of all sizes.
hero.title: Restaurant POS System for Modern Food Service
All Hospitality Features
hero.subtitle: Everything your restaurant needs to run smoothly, from table management to kitchen display systems.

list.title: Complete Feature Set
list.subtitle: Explore all the tools designed specifically for restaurants, cafes, and bars.

faq.a1: Yes, Konty supports multi-location management with centralized reporting.
faq.a2: Yes, all transactions sync automatically when connection is restored.
faq.a3: Most restaurants are up and running within 48 hours.
faq.q4: Can I keep my existing hardware?
faq.a4: Yes, Konty works with most existing POS hardware.
faq.a5: Our intuitive interface requires minimal training. Most staff learn in under 30 minutes.

list.title: Complete Feature Set
list.subtitle: Discover all the tools built specifically for retail stores and chains.

faq.q1: Can I manage inventory across multiple stores?
faq.a1: Yes, real-time inventory sync across all your locations.
faq.a2: Yes, works with all standard barcode scanners and mobile devices.
faq.a3: Built-in loyalty program with points, discounts, and customer tracking.
faq.q4: Can I import my existing inventory?
faq.a4: Yes, we provide free data migration from your current system.
faq.a5: Simple one-click returns with automatic inventory adjustment.
